data.name: Amshay
data.detailed_description: Strategically drop beautiful gems and steel beams in an addicting pursuit to capture 100 hideous, insane creatures. Play solo or couch co-op with a friend, searching through the puzzling wasteland in a never-ending battle to get the high score on 12 separate in-game mode combinations. In time attack, you (or you and a friend in co-op) have only 180 seconds to wreak as much havoc as possible. Play on three different board sizes, each with their own wacky strengths and weaknesses. With a riveting choice of Classical or Jazz soundtracks, you'll be humming along for hours in this addictive falling-block puzzler! If you love dropping blocks and making crush, you'll love Amshay!
data.about_the_game: Strategically drop beautiful gems and steel beams in an addicting pursuit to capture 100 hideous, insane creatures. Play solo or couch co-op with a friend, searching through the puzzling wasteland in a never-ending battle to get the high score on 12 separate in-game mode combinations. In time attack, you (or you and a friend in co-op) have only 180 seconds to wreak as much havoc as possible. Play on three different board sizes, each with their own wacky strengths and weaknesses. With a riveting choice of Classical or Jazz soundtracks, you'll be humming along for hours in this addictive falling-block puzzler! If you love dropping blocks and making crush, you'll love Amshay!
data.short_description: Strategically drop beautiful gems and ugly blobs in an addictive pursuit attempting to capture 100 hideous freaks! Play solo or with a partner in couch co-op. Chase high scores in endless or time attack modes. If you love dropping blocks and making crush, you'll love Amshay!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 64-bit
  • Processor: Celeron
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD
  • Storage: 2 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 64-bit
  • Processor: 1 GHZ
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: onboard
  • Storage: 5 MB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 64-bit Linux-based distro with GLFW3
  • Processor: Celeron
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any compliant OpenGL 2.x
  • Storage: 2 MB available space
